items.title: Hegseth orders pause in US cyber-offensive against Russia
items.description: The reported directive from the defence secretary comes during an American push to end the war in Ukraine.

items.title: Mother on trial over abduction of six-year-old daughter in South Africa

items.title: Bubble tea chain bigger than Starbucks sees shares jump on debut

items.title: Watch: Standout moments from the Oscars 2025
items.description: Anora sweeps the Oscars with five awards including best picture and best actress for star Mikey Madison.
